Topic.Title: Primal Battle Z - Arcade Mode Demo 2021

Posts.EditableText:
Hello, everyone.
The update is complete. The file is over 180 MB and can't upload it. I will do my best to reduce the size and re-upload. Thanks for your support and I will post ASAP.

Posts.EditableText:
Good news! The files have been reduced to 50 MB. 
The updated version 1.09 is ready.  It will take some time to update.
The final update will be between Spring to Summer 2021. The demo will be finalized afterwards.
Thanks for your patience!
Link: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/6lf2axlwbkmtm3ryv_3hwa/primal-battle-z-arcade-demo

Posts.EditableText:
I'm beyond excited for this! the action, bumpin' beats, and fluid sprite work is gonna bring me joy in 2021. The music reminds me a bit of Marvel Super Heroes for the arcades.
Give your music a background voice to speak up title and who created it: like it's TW presents by using https://texttospeech.onl
